text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Spirits are high at Tracen Academy's<n>public scrimmage.
Among them, one<n>student in particular is receiving a lot<n>of
attention.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Huff... puff...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Haru Urara still trails behind the<n>others, but one look at her
face and<n>you know she's not giving up! Look<n>at her go!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: It's not... over yet!

text_block_list.name: Farmer
text_block_list.text: That's it, Urara! Go!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's picking up speed, but it's no<n>good! The other
Umamusume are still<n>out of her reach! Will Haru Urara give<n>
up hope?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Urgh... Never! Just... you... watch!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Finiiish!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Haru Urara's growing popularity has<n>nothing to do with her
speed, or even<n>her form...

text_block_list.name: Neighbor Lady
text_block_list.text: Good job, Urara! You sure put up a<n>fight on the final stretch!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, thanks! I might've lost, but I'll<n>take home the gold
next time for sure!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
What garners people's attention is<n>her unwavering resolve.
No matter<n>how bitter the loss, she still marches<n>on with a
smile on her face.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: So? How'd I do? What was my time?
choice_data_list: A little slower than your best, I'm afraid...
A little slower than your best, I'm afraid...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Seriously?! I coulda sworn I beat it! Oh<n>well, guess I'll have
to work even<n>harder at practice tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, could I have a moment of<n>your time?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Suddenly, a woman holding a camera<n>approaches us. She
hands me a<n>business card.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hm? "Umamusume Monthly"? You<n>write for this magazine?

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text:
That I do! And I've also been a fan of<n>yours since the
tryouts!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Really?! Ehehe, thanks for the<n>support! Hm? Do you take
pictures for<n>the magazine too?

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text: Yes! I got some really nice shots of<n>you running today!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Whoooa! Can I see?! What do I look<n>like when I'm
running?! Show me!

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, all right, all right. I'll pick out a<n>few especially nice
shots and send<n>them your way.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
True to her word, we receive<n>photographs from the reporter<n>
several days later.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Wow! I look so cute in these! Ah, but<n>look at how flared my
nostrils are in<n>this one! Aw geez...
choice_data_list: She also wrote you a message of support.
She also wrote you a message of support.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Whoa... She's saying such nice<n>things about me! Ehehe...
Ah, she<n>even mentions you!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
"Ever since you started working with<n>your trainer, your
smile's gotten even<n>brighter."

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
"That must be one heck of a trainer."<n>Did you hear that?!
She really likes<n>you!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Same here!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I'm not the only one people cheer for.<n>If I do well, people
will cheer for you<n>too...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Guess I have another reason<n>to work hard!
